Package com.cloudera.oryx.common.math

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Solver
    A solver for the system Ax = b, where A is an n x n matrix and x and b are n-element vectors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRealVectorPreservingVisitor
    Dummy implementation of RealVectorPreservingVisitor which implements its methods with no-ops.
    CommonsMathLinearSystemSolver
    An implementation based on RRQRDecomposition from Commons Math.
    MatrixUtils
    Contains utility methods for dealing with matrices, which are here represented as LongObjectMaps of LongFloatMaps, or of float[].
    NamedRealVector
    Decorates a RealVector with a String name.
    OpenMapRealVector
    Rescued from Commons Math 3.2.
    SimpleVectorMath
    Simple utility methods related to vectors represented as simple float[]s.
    SparseRealVector
    Rescued from Commons Math 3.2.
    Vectors
    Factory methods for working with Vector objects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllConditionedSolverException
    Thrown when a matrix operator seems to be ill-conditioned -- large max absolute row sum norm.
    SingularMatrixSolverException  
    SolverException
    Superclass of exceptions related to solving a linear system.
